name: Anubis Clicker
description:
Anubis Clicker is a game about making an absurd amount of Gold . To help you in this endeavor, you will recruit a wide variety of helpful Gold makers,
like Salves Employee ( Slaves Names ) : (Abah , Bilah , Comba and Etc,,,,)

Anubis Clicker was originally released in 2022

*Collect Gold and spend them to earn even more Golds

*Mini-games

*Pet your Salves

*Cloud saving

*Daily Updates
